translations: n.费密子（费密系统的粒子）

phrs.translation: 费米子, 缉熙, 费米
马约拉纳费米子, 马约拉那费米子
费密子场, 费米子场

sentences.sentence: In this paper the SLAC bag model is discussed by using the method of fermion coherent state.
sentences.translation: 作为应用费米相干态处理量子场论问题的一种尝试，本文利用费米相干态讨论了SLAC口袋模型。

sentences.sentence: In this paper, a kind of so (14) grand unified model which can contain two right-left fermion generations is discussed in some detail.
sentences.translation: 本文详细讨论了一类能容纳左右二代费半子的SO(14)大统一模型。

sentences.sentence: The formalism presented here can be applied to nuclear as well as other many fermion systems in both equilibrium and nonequilibrium states.
sentences.translation: 本文的讨论也适用于处于平衡或非平衡定常态的其他多体系统。
